description: In this quick and easy dish, prawns and asparagus are stir-fried in a light white wine sauce and served over creamy, cheesy polenta.
name: Prawn & Asparagus Stir-fry With Polenta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the polenta evenly between four plates and top with one-quarter of the prawn and asparagus stir-fry. Garnish with cheese and serve hot with lemon slices.
